title: revise trademark policy
author: ebullient
content:
This is a substantial revision. Sources: 

- [OpenJSF Trademark Policy](https://trademark-policy.openjsf.org/)
- [Gnome Foundation Trademark Usage Guildelines](https://wiki.gnome.org/FoundationBoard/Resources/LicensingGuidelines)
- [Linux Foundation Trademark Usage Policy](https://www.linuxfoundation.org/legal/trademark-usage)
- [OSI Trademark Guidelines](https://opensource.org/trademark-guidelines/#Proper_Trademark_Use)

Many of these were based on Model Trademark Guidelines (now in the wayback machine):
https://web.archive.org/web/20230625000001/http://modeltrademarkguidelines.org/index.php/Model_Trademark_Guidelines
